   20: %% Originally based on Per Gustafsson's test suite.
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(mc_no_ssa_opt_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   26: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   27:          basic/1,duplicate_keys/1,mixed/1,
   28:          shadow/1,bad_generators/1]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group,p}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   39:       [basic,
   40:        duplicate_keys,
   41:        mixed,
   42:        shadow,
   43:        bad_generators]}].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: -record(foo, {a,b}).
   59: 
   60: basic(_Config) ->
   61:     mc_double(0),
   62:     mc_double(1),
   63:     mc_double(2),
   64:     mc_double(3),
   65:     mc_double(4),
   66:     mc_double(5),
   67: 
   68:     mc_double(17),
   69:     mc_double(18),
   70:     mc_double(19),
   71: 
   72:     mc_double(30),
   73:     mc_double(31),
   74:     mc_double(32),
   75:     mc_double(33),
   76:     mc_double(34),
   77: 
   78:     mc_double(63),
   79:     mc_double(64),
   80:     mc_double(65),
   81: 
   82:     mc_double(77),
   83:     mc_double(127),
   84:     mc_double(128),
   85:     mc_double(255),
   86:     mc_double(333),
   87:     mc_double(444),
   88:     mc_double(7777),
   89:     mc_double(8765),
   90: 
   91:     %% Patterns that cannot possibly match.
   92:     #{} = #{K => V || K := [V]={V} <- id(#{a => [b]})},
   93:     #{} = #{K => V || [K] = 42 := V <- id(#{42 => whatever})},
   94: 
   95:     %% Filtering.
   96:     Map = #{{a,1} => {a,b,c}, {b,42} => [1,2,3], c => [4,5,6], d => {x,y}},
   97:     [c, d] = lists:sort([K || K := _ <- Map, is_atom(K)]),
   98:     [{a,b,c}, [1,2,3]] = lists:sort([V || {_,_} := V <- Map]),
   99:     [1] = [H || {_,_} := [H|_] <- Map],
  100:     [c, {b,42}] = lists:sort([K || K := [_|_] <- Map]),
  101: 
  102:     %% Filtering using literal patterns.
  103:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{}],
  104:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{x => y}],
  105:     [0] = [0 || a := b <- #{a => b}],
  106: 
  107:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{} >>,
  108:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{x => y} >>,
  109:     <<0>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{a => b} >>,
  110: 
  111:     %% Matching partial records.
  112:     RecordMap = id(#{#foo{a=I,b=I*I} => I*I*I || I <- [1,2,3,4]}),
  113: 
  114:     EvenMap = maps:from_list([{K,V} ||
  115:                                  {#foo{a=N}=K,V} <- maps:to_list(RecordMap),
  116:                                  N rem 2 =:= 0]),
  117:     EvenMap = #{K => V ||
  118:                   #foo{a=N}=K := V <- RecordMap,
  119:                   N rem 2 =:= 0},
  120: 
  121:     Odd = lists:sort([V || {#foo{a=N}, V} <- maps:to_list(RecordMap),
  122:                            N rem 2 =:= 1]),
  123:     Odd = lists:sort([V || #foo{a=N} := V <- RecordMap, N rem 2 =:= 1]),
  124: 
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: mc_double(Size) ->
  128:     Seq = lists:seq(1, Size),
  129:     Map = #{{key,I} => I || I <- Seq},
  130: 
  131:     MapDouble = #{K => 2 * V || K := V <- id(Map)},
  132:     MapDouble = maps:from_list([{{key,I}, 2 * I} || I <- Seq]),
  133: 
  134:     OddKeys = lists:seq(1, Size, 2),
  135:     OddKeys = lists:sort([I || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  136:                                I rem 2 =/= 0]),
  137: 
  138:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  139:                           I rem 2 =/= 0},
  140:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  141:                           id(I) rem 2 =/= 0},
  142:     OddKeys = lists:sort(maps:keys(OddMap)),
  143: 
  144:     %% Test that map comprehensions works on iterators.
  145:     test_iterator(Map, 0),
  146:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 3),
  147:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 2),
  148:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map)),
  149: 
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: test_iterator(Map, N) ->
  153:     Iter0 = maps:iterator(Map),
  154:     {First,Iter} = grab(N, Iter0, []),
  155:     All = [{K,V} || K := V <- Iter] ++ First,
  156:     Map = maps:from_list(All),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: grab(0, Iter, Acc) ->
  160:     {Acc,Iter};
  161: grab(N, Iter0, Acc) ->
  162:     case maps:next(Iter0) of
  163:         none ->
  164:             {Acc,Iter0};
  165:         {K,V,Iter} ->
  166:             grab(N - 1, Iter, [{K,V}|Acc])
  167:     end.
  168: 
  169: duplicate_keys(_Config) ->
  170:     #{x := b} = #{V => K || {K,V} <- [{a, x}, {b, x}]},
  171: 
  172:     #{a := 4, b := 4} =
  173:         #{K => V || K <- [a,b],
  174:                     <<V>> <= <<1,2,3,4>>},
  175:     ok.
  176: 
  177: mixed(_Config) ->
  178:     Map = id(#{1 => 10, 2 => 5, 3 => 88, 4 => 99, 5 => 36}),
  179:     Bin = << <<K:8,V:24>> || K := V <- Map >>,
  180:     Map = maps:from_list([{K,V} || <<K:8,V:24>> <= Bin]),
  181: 
  182:     Atoms = [list_to_atom([C]) || C <- lists:seq($a, $z)],
  183:     Integers = lists:seq(1, 64),
  184: 
  185:     mixed_1(Atoms, Integers),
  186:     mixed_2(Atoms, Integers),
  187:     mixed_3(Atoms, Integers),
  188: 
  189:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(7),
  190:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(10),
  191: 
  192:     ok.
  193: 
  194: mixed_1(Atoms, Integers) ->
  195:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  196:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  197:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  198:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  199:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap)],
  200:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N <- IntegerKeys],
  201: 
  202:     ok.
  203: 
  204: mixed_2(Atoms, Integers) ->
  205:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  206:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  207:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || N := [] <- IntegerMap >>,
  208:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  209: 
  210:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- IntegerMap, C <- Atoms],
  211:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap), C <- Atoms],
  212:     Combined = [{C,N} || <<N:16>> <= Bin, C <- Atoms],
  213:     Combined = [{C,N} || N <- IntegerKeys, C <- Atoms],
  214: 
  215:     ok.
  216: 
  217: mixed_3(Atoms, Integers) ->
  218:     Map = #{K => V || {K,V} <- lists:zip(Atoms, Integers, trim)},
  219:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || _ := N <- Map >>,
  220:     {TrimmedAtoms,TrimmedIntegers} = lists:unzip([{K,V} || K := V <- Map]),
  221: 
  222:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K := _ <- Map, _ := V <- Map]),
  223:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, <<V:16>> <= Bin]),
  224:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, V <- TrimmedIntegers]),
  225: 
  226:     ok.
  227: 
  228: sum_of_triangular_numbers(N) ->
  229:     Sum = N * (N + 1) * (N + 2) div 6,
  230:     Maps = [#{I => I || I <- lists:seq(0, I)} || I <- lists:seq(0, N)],
  231:     Numbers = [I || M <- Maps, I := I <- M],
  232:     Numbers = lists:flatten([[I || I := I <- M] || M <- Maps]),
  233:     Sum = lists:sum([lists:sum([I || I := I <- M]) || M <- Maps]),
  234:     Sum = lists:sum(Numbers),
  235:     ok.
  236: 
  237: shadow(_Config)->
  238:     Shadowed = nomatch,
  239:     _ = id(Shadowed),				%Eliminate warning.
  240:     Map = #{Shadowed => Shadowed+1 || Shadowed <- lists:seq(7, 9)},
  241:     #{7 := 8, 8 := 9, 9 := 10} = id(Map),
  242:     [8,9] = lists:sort([Shadowed || _ := Shadowed <- id(Map),
  243:                                     Shadowed < 10]),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: bad_generators(_Config) ->
  247:     %% Make sure that line numbers point out the generator.
  248:     case ?MODULE of
  249:         mc_inline_SUITE ->
  250:             ok;
  251:         _ ->
  252:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  253:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  254:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  255:                 catch id(bad_generator(a)),
  256: 
  257:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  258:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  259:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  260:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(a)),
  261: 
  262:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  263:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  264:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  265:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(a)),
  266: 
  267:             BadIterator = [16#ffff|#{}],
  268: 
  269:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  270:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  271:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  272:                 catch id(bad_generator(BadIterator)),
  273: 
  274:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  275:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  276:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  277:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(BadIterator)),
  278: 
  279:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  280:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  281:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  282:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(BadIterator))
  283:     end,
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: id(I) -> I.
  287: 
  288: -file("bad_mc.erl", 1).
  289: bad_generator(Map) ->                           %Line 2
  290:     [{K,V} ||                                   %Line 3
  291:         K := V <- Map].                         %Line 4
  292: bad_generator_bc(Map) ->                        %Line 5
  293:     << <<K:8,V:24>> ||                          %Line 6
  294:         K := V <- Map>>.                        %Line 7
  295: bad_generator_mc(Map) ->                        %Line 8
  296:     #{V => K ||                                 %Line 9
  297:         K := V <- Map}.                         %Line 10
